explanation: [0-0] The video begins with two boys in white short-sleeved shirts, set against a green chalkboard background. They have short black hair and are smiling, revealing their white teeth. The boy on the left has a black string around his neck with a rectangular cardboard piece attached. The boy on the right has a piece of cardboard clipped to his upper left pocket with black writing on it. Above the image is a white caption "Oh my god" and an emoticon.

[0-6] After clapping his hands once, the boy on the right puts his left hand over his mouth, and starts rhythmically patting his chest with his right hand, staring at the camera with wide eyes. The boy on the left claps his hands rhythmically, his mouth open, staring at the camera with wide eyes.
